select r.budget_month, p.place_code, count(r.request_code) as "budget_count", sum(l.request_list_totalprice) as "budget_totalprice", TRUNCATE(sum(l.request_list_totalprice)*0.95, -1) as "budget_possibleprice", CEIL( sum(l.request_list_totalprice)*0.05 * POWER(10, -1) ) / POWER(10, -1) as "budget_charge", r.budget_period, r.request_status from request_list l, (select request_date as "budget_count", DATE_FORMAT(request_date, "%c") as "budget_month", request_code, request_status, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(request_date, "%Y"),"년 ",DATE_FORMAT(request_date, "%c"), "월") as "budget_period" from request where request_status = "완료") r, product p where r.request_code = l.request_code and l.product_code = p.product_code and place_code = #{place_code} group by r.budget_month
